workshoptitle: Simple Data Driven applications using JavaScript in Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Simple Data Driven applications using JavaScript workshop

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Get started with JavaScript development using a community module
tutorials.description: Set up your environment and implement the validator.js module in your application

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create JavaScript modules and environments
tutorials.description: Learn more about creating JavaScript modules and environments

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Declare JavaScript functions
tutorials.description: Learn how to expose JavaScript code in SQL and PL/SQL

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Interact with the database using the JavaScript SQL Driver
tutorials.description: Learn how to access schema objects using the JavaScript SQL Driver

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Work effectively with JSON
tutorials.description: Learn how to work with JSON using a document model

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Get insights into your code using Post-Execution Debugging
tutorials.description: Learn how to use Post-Execution debugging for JavaScript modules

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Instructions for setup, tear-down and backup
tutorials.description: Learn how to configure the lab, tear it down, and back up your progress
